title: Indian Spicy Fried Rice
content:
Ingredients: Cooked Rice : Either Normal Rice/ Basmati 🍚 Rice Capsicum - Diced - 2 tb sp Mixed veggies: Carrot, Beans, Sweet Corn 🌽 and GreenPeas Sliced Onion - 1/2 cup Broccoli - 1/2 cup Carrot - sliced - 1/4 cup Spring Onion - chopped - 1/2 cup Coriander - 1/4 cup Ginger-Garlic paste - 1 tb sp Soya sauce - 1 tb sp Green chilly sauce - 1 tb sp Vinegar - 1 tb sp Pepper powder - 1/2 tb sp Garam Masala Powder - 1/2 tb sp Green chillies - 4 - sliced Salt - to taste Lemon juice - 1 tb sp (optional) Oil - 2 tb sp Procedure:
  • Heat frying pan on medium heat
  • Add oil
  • Add ginger-garlic paste and all veggies
  • Saute for 2 mins
  • Add soya sauce, Green chilly sauce and vinegar. Mix them well
  • Add cooked rice and saute / toss for few seconds
  • Add salt,pepper powder and garam masala
  • Mix them well and saute/toss for one min
  • Check taste of fried rice. If required add salt
  • Finally add spring Onion and coriander
  • Indian spicy fried rice is ready
  • Serve it hot with sliced onion and lemon juice / Tomato sauce
  • You can serve @ lunch/ evening/dinner/party 🎉 time
  • Enjoy your day 😀😋
